name: Chelsea
description: Professional Teacher | 5+ Years Experience in Private Schools, Universities & Online. I am extremely patient and kind as a teacher. Because I have studied many languages myself, I understand the challenges.

name: Yuki
description: Native Japanese speaker with 3+ years of experience helping students speak naturally and confidently. I love using anime and pop culture to keep lessons fun and relevant!

name: Carlos
description: PhD in Linguistics and university lecturer. I specialize in academic Spanish and professional communication. Serious but friendly approach to help you master grammar and fluency.

name: Fatima
description: I'm a certified Arabic tutor who loves helping beginners fall in love with the language. I use interactive tools and games to make learning fun and engaging!

name: Igor
description: Helping professionals improve Business English skills with real-world materials, mock interviews, and presentations. Tailored lessons for tech, finance, and management.

name: Sofia
description: Olá! I'm here to help you get comfortable speaking Brazilian Portuguese in real-life situations. Let's chat about anything — music, travel, food, or your hobbies!

name: Ahmed
description: British Council-certified IELTS instructor with a 98% success rate. I provide structured preparation plans with detailed feedback on writing and speaking.

name: Mia
description: Specialized in teaching young learners through storytelling, songs, and playful learning. Parents receive regular updates and progress reports.

name: Jean
description: Bonjour! I focus on helping intermediate learners tackle tricky grammar and improve their writing. Clear explanations, lots of practice, and no pressure.

name: Linh
description: Build your confidence to speak fluently and fearlessly! My sessions focus on daily conversation and pronunciation correction through guided talk.
